com.paydiant.android.logging

Interface ISDKLoggingUtility

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PaydiantLoggingUtility

    public interface ISDKLoggingUtility
    Defines the methods to provide support for SDK logging implementations. See the Paydiant Android SDK Developer Guide's Logging Module chapter to get more information on the custom logging implementation.
    Since:
    4.6.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant
    See Also:
    PaydiantLoggingUtility

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addFailedLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType, String displayMessage, PaydiantException e)
      Adds a failed event log message.
      void addFailedLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType, String displayMessage, PaydiantException e, LinkedHashMap<PaydiantLoggingEntryKey,String> eventParameters)
      Adds a failed event log message with additional event parameters.
      void addSuccessLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType)
      Adds a successful event log message.
      void addSuccessLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType, LinkedHashMap<PaydiantLoggingEntryKey,String> eventParameters)
      Adds a successful event log message with additional event parameters.
      boolean isCustomLoggingEnabled()
      Returns whether the app developer is providing a custom logging implementations to handle logging success/failed SDK events.
      void sendLogMessages()
      Sends the log messages to the server.

    • Method Detail

      • addSuccessLogMessage

        void addSuccessLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType)
        Adds a successful event log message.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type of the successful event. (E.g.: PaydiantLoggingEventType.ADD_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS)

      • addSuccessLogMessage

        void addSuccessLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType,
                        LinkedHashMap<PaydiantLoggingEntryKey,String> eventParameters)
        Adds a successful event log message with additional event parameters.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type of the successful event. (E.g.: PaydiantLoggingEventType.ADD_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS)
        eventParameters - Additional parameters that needed to be passed along with the successful event, if applicable.

      • addFailedLogMessage

        void addFailedLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType,
                       String displayMessage,
                       PaydiantException e)
        Adds a failed event log message.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type of the failed event. (E.g.: PaydiantLoggingEventType.ADD_ACCOUNT_FAIL)
        displayMessage - Message prompted during the failed event.
        e - PaydiantException object returned for the failed event, if available.

      • addFailedLogMessage

        void addFailedLogMessage(PaydiantLoggingEventType eventType,
                       String displayMessage,
                       PaydiantException e,
                       LinkedHashMap<PaydiantLoggingEntryKey,String> eventParameters)
        Adds a failed event log message with additional event parameters.
        Parameters:
        eventType - event type of the failed event. (E.g.: PaydiantLoggingEventType.ADD_ACCOUNT_FAIL)
        displayMessage - Message prompted during the failed event.
        e - PaydiantException object returned for the failed event, if available.
        eventParameters - Additional parameters that needed to be passed along with the failed event, if applicable.

      • sendLogMessages

        void sendLogMessages()
        Sends the log messages to the server.

      • isCustomLoggingEnabled

        boolean isCustomLoggingEnabled()
        Returns whether the app developer is providing a custom logging implementations to handle logging success/failed SDK events. This should return false by default to use the SDK's internal logging mechanism.
